bestBHT.bht: Fretting about the things we lack will not bring us the least of what we desire, but it may worsen our plight. If we cannot add even a small measure to our age, why trouble ourselves with matters of greater consequence? Jesus emphasizes the importance of food and clothing, which are essential for sustaining and prolonging life. Instead of wasting our time and energy on worry, we should trust in God's provision and focus on what truly matters.

Jamieson-Fausset-Brown: Corroding solicitude will not bring you the least of the things ye fret about.
Though it may double the evil of wanting them.
If not the least, why vex yourselves about things of more consequence?
Marvin Vincent: The original meaning of the word is time of life, age." (Luke 12:25)
A measure of time is sometimes represented by a measure of length." (Luke 12:25)
Christ is speaking of food and clothing, the object of which is to foster and prolong life." (Luke 12:25)
Archibald T. Robertson: A cubit (πηχυν). Matthew 6:27 has πηχυν ενα (one cubit, though ενα is sometimes merely the indefinite article.
Stature (ηλικιαν) as in Matthew, which see.
John Gill: And which of you with taking thought,.... In an anxious and distressing manner, for food and raiment, in order to preserve and continue life,
add to his stature one cubit?
The Persic version reads, 'to his stature and height', as if this referred to the height of stature; whereas it seems rather to regard the age of a man, and the continuance of his life.
this referred to the height of stature; whereas it seems rather to regard the age of a man, and the continuance of his life.
John Wesley: Which of you can add the least measure.

bhtAttempts.bht: Fretting about the things we lack will not bring us any closer to obtaining them; in fact, it may even worsen our situation. If we cannot even add a small measure to our time of life or our age, why waste our time and energy worrying about things of greater importance? Jesus specifically mentions food and clothing, which are necessary for sustaining and prolonging life. Instead of being consumed by anxiety, we should trust in God's provision and focus on the things that truly matter.

Fretting about the things we lack will not bring us the least of what we desire, but it may worsen our plight. If we cannot add even a small measure to our age, why trouble ourselves with matters of greater consequence? Jesus emphasizes the importance of food and clothing, which are essential for sustaining and prolonging life. Instead of wasting our time and energy on worry, we should trust in God's provision and focus on what truly matters.

Jesus reminds us that worrying about material possessions will not bring us any closer to obtaining them and may actually make things worse. He emphasizes the futility of trying to add even a small measure to our age or time of life. Instead, we should focus on the necessities like food and clothing that nurture and prolong our existence. Rather than being consumed by anxiety, we should trust in God's provision and prioritize the things that truly matter in life.

Jesus highlights the pointlessness of being preoccupied with our unmet needs, as it will not bring us any closer to obtaining them and may even worsen our predicament. He calls attention to the inability to add even a small measure to our age or time of life. Instead, Jesus urges us to focus on the essentials such as food and clothing, which contribute to our well-being and longevity. Rather than succumbing to anxiety, we ought to trust in God's provision and concentrate on the things that truly hold significance.

Jesus teaches us the futility of constantly worrying about our material needs, as it will not bring us any closer to obtaining them and may even exacerbate our lack. He emphasizes that not even a small measure can be added to our age or time of life. Jesus highlights the importance of basic necessities like food and clothing, which contribute to our sustenance and well-being. Instead of being consumed by anxiety, we should trust in God's provision and focus on the things that truly matter in life.
